explanation: BTC remains the primary focus of discussion with strong community engagement. Multiple participants note uptrend structure, positive momentum, and support from both retail and institutional traders. Many users discuss holding or buying BTC, and several mention that altcoins are being sold to rotate into BTC. There are also references to BTC being propped up by Wall Street and high liquidity, and even in the face of market volatility and short-term pullbacks, the general consensus leans bullish. Notable opinions include suggestions to buy now, expectations of new all-time highs (ATH) soon, and advice to avoid shorting above certain price levels. Concerns about short-term volatility and the need for discipline are noted, but don't outweigh the dominant positive sentiment.
